      • isPartInHouse

        void isPartInHouse​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Checks the radio buttons, and changes the label on Machine ID
        Parameters:
        event - trigger event: if user selects in house or outsourced

      • OnActionDisplayMainMenu

        void OnActionDisplayMainMenu​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Displays the main menu when the user presses the cancel button. The following code casts the event to let the application know that the event was triggered by a button on a stage
        Parameters:
        event - the triggering event: User presses cancel
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - catches exception

      • RedirectToMainScreen

        public void RedirectToMainScreen()
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Method redirects users to the main screen after a Part is saved to inventory
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - catches exception

      • AssignName

        public java.lang.String AssignName()
        Returns:
        returns the name entered by the user or a default name if none is entered

      • assignInventory

        public int assignInventory()
        Reads the user input for the inventory amount (stock), the maximum inventory allowed (max) and the minimum inventory allowed (min) Checks that the inventory amount is in between the min and max stock amount Catches the number format exception if the input is something other than an int for inventory Provides dialog boxes for the user to correct errors
        Returns:
        inventory amount

      • assignPrice

        public double assignPrice()
        Checks if the price is empty, throws dialog box if true. Checks if the input is a double, throws dialog box if false
        Returns:
        returns part price

      • assignMin

        public int assignMin()
        Checks if the min is less than max, throws alert if not
        Returns:
        the inventory minimum

      • assignMax

        public int assignMax()
        Checks if max is more than min, throws alert if not
        Returns:
        the inventory maximum

      • alert

        public void alert()
        Alert which is called in the empty field check

      • emptyFieldAlert

        public void emptyFieldAlert()
        Checks for empty fields, calls above alert if any are found

      • AssignId

        public int AssignId()
        Assigns the unique id to the part. First the method sorts the parts by id then gets the highest id on the list and increments it
        Returns:
        is the id to be assigned to the part in OnActionSavePart(ActionEvent event)

      • OnActionSavePart

        void OnActionSavePart​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Saves the part to the Observable list "Parts" Retrieves user input and converts the data types
        Parameters:
        event - the triggering event: User clicks "save"
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - catches exception Checks if the part is in house and adds the new part to either In-sourced to outsourced parts

        Initializes the controller
